duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and maintain Guest Services in a retail store environment.
Oversee the operation of the store, ensuring maximum sales and profitability.
Control expenses, shrinkage, and manage human resources.
Manage all aspects of merchandising and inventory control in adherence to company policies.
Ensure compliance with all Company policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Prior retail management experience is required. Minimum age requirement for a Store Manager is 21.
